description: Tall, athletic Pierce Paris is working for a car service, and his client dark-haired Cazden Hunter won’t stop commenting on how good he looks. Normally the shy hunk doesn’t mind, but he’s not used to men coming on to him, and asks the chiseled cutie to quit it. Cazden just can’t help his curiosity, and offers him a generous tip if he’ll show him how big his dick is. Pierce can do with the extra coins so he pulls out his massive, thick cock, and collects his cash. Horny Cazden doesn’t stop there as he offers him an even bigger tip to come upstairs, and turn him into his bottom bitch.
title: Up The Ante: Bareback
